body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, merchant. Nelson County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah Wroe McAdams. Father of Eliza McAdams, Ann McAdams, William L. McAdams, Catherine McAdams, Forrest McAdams, Frank McAdams, and Charles McAdams. Raised in Indiana and returned to Hawesville, Kentucky in 1831. Merchant in Hancock County in 1850. Commissioner of the Hancock Manufacturing Company and the Hancock Mining Company in 1851. Merchant in Hancock County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860. Hired one enslaved person in 1860.
